Keywords/Strategy: ("older adults" OR seniors OR elderly) AND ("conversational agent*" OR chatbot* OR "voice assistant*") AND (health OR healthcare)

Keywords/Strategy: Backward chaining from Zubatiy et al. 2023 reference list (filter: HCI empirical studies on older adults + intelligent assistants + health information)
Inclusion Criteria: HCI empirical studies on voice assistants / caregiving / AI limitations

Keywords/Strategy: Forward chaining: "Zubatiy 2023" (title) AND cited-by in Google Scholar (filter: 2023-2026, HCI/CSCW/CHI/TOCHI venues)

Keywords/Strategy: ("dark pattern*" OR "deceptive design" OR "manipulative interface*" OR "digital nudge*") AND (AI OR algorithm* OR "conversational agent*" OR chatbot*) AND ("older adults" OR aging OR geriatric)
Notes: Core dark patterns literature; Gray 2018 = Tier 1 foundational taxonomy

Keywords/Strategy: ("patient portal*" OR "electronic patient portal*") AND ("older adults" OR aging OR geriatric) AND (usability OR "user experience" OR "user-centred design")
